original_text: Then the officer led the young man to the soldiers' leader. He said to him, ‘Paul, who is here in the prison, spoke to me. He asked me to bring this young man to you. He has something to tell you.’
korean_text: 천부장에게로 데리고 가서 이르되 죄수 바울이 나를 불러 이 청년이 당신께 할 말이 있다 하여 데리고 가기를 청하더이다 하매

sentences.original_text: Then the officer led the young man
'Paul, who is here in the prison, spoke to me
He asked me to bring this young man to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 젊은이를 당신에게 데려오도록 나에게 부탁했습니다'

sentences.original_text: He has something to tell you'
